cast.name: 沃拉娜特·旺萨莞 Woranuch Wongsawan
萨维特·佩维德西里 Bee Swiss Petvisetsiri
戴德·纳塔南·昆瓦特 Thaed Nuttanan Khunwat
玛郁琳·彭普潘 Mayurin Pongpudpunth
派罗吉·桑瓦里布 Phairote Sangwaribut
夏纳纳·努塔科姆 Chanana Nutakom

introduction: Saiban's mother died heartbroken after her father's infidelity. Saiban frequently visits her mother's grave on a hill near their house. Saiban's grandparents own a vast mushroom plantation in Chiang Mai. Her father, now remarried, has a stepson, Nopepamai, who intends to marry Saiban for her inheritance. Nopepamai, a brilliant mushroom expert, becomes a professor in Chiang Mai and works at the family plantation. He falls for Saiban, but she only sees him as a mushroom doctor. Despite her attempts to stay away, her grandfather insists she learn from him to run the business, bringing them closer.
